action_description: This Action will set your Wiser Air Thermostat to the temperature you specify. Eco IQ is disabled by running this Action.
This Action will set your Wiser Air Thermostat to Home, Away or Sleep mode. Eco IQ is disabled by running this Action.
This Action will set your Wiser Air Thermostat to Off, Heat, Cool, or Auto mode. Eco IQ is disabled by running this Action.
